r.s: Classes to manipulate chemical objects: atoms, molecules, etc.
r.d: General classes to represent Atoms, Molecules and Macromolecules. Also parsing code for PDB, CML and XYZ file formats. Examples of parsing and conversion to/from chemical structure formats. Includes a utility class with information on the Elements in the Periodic Table.
r.n: Modified the parsing algorithm for atom records in a residue Added toXYZ() methods, and made toString() aliases of those Added one more example for converting PDB to XYZ
